title:
A Note on Valid Inequalities for PageRank Optimization with Edge
  Selection Constraints
authors: Shang-Ru Yang, Yung-Han Liao, Chih-Ching Chien, Hao-Hsiang Wu
abstract:
Cs\'{a}ji, Jungers, and Blondel prove that while a PageRank optimization
problem with edge selection constraints is NP-hard, it can be solved optimally
in polynomial time for the unconstrained case. This theoretical result is
accompanied by several observations, which we leverage to develop valid
inequalities in polynomial time for this class of NP-hard problems.
